channel.title: Devolution help pl0x?
channel.description:
Okay i will need help with all these wildy/pk Errors...
-When ur killing npc/player with melee and fast start magic it hits like 6secs 0 and then just starts hitting. -In wildy theres 2 "attack" buttons and when u press other it is same as "walk here" -Some times when i press "attack" it will clost... -Ice mages doesnt freeze players...
ANY HELP PLZ!
